author: cschoett
msg: Fix for minor apt issue when an '@Control' annotation is placed on a POJO field instead of a control field.  Behavior was to fail with an assertion error, updated to let apt fail and report error instead.

msg: HADOOP-551.  Revert JobClient's console printout to only include a maximum of one update per percent of progress.  Contributed by Owen.
